member.name: T:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions
member.summary: The class providing extension methods for handling skins.

member.name: T:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ModSkinInfo
member.summary: A class for handling skin information with mod specification attached. Mostly intended to be used for transferring skins between units or over time.

member.name: F:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ModSkinInfo.packageId
member.summary: The mod id the skin belongs to (empty if the skin is not external).

member.name: P:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ModSkinInfo.lorName
member.summary: The full identifier of the skin. Can be used to change to the skin using ChangeSkin.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ModSkinInfo.Compress
member.summary: "Compresses" the skin LorName to fit into a regular SkinInfo (see ). Note that if the state is Default, changing other units' skins by compressed info will not work!

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeSkin(BattleUnitView,LorIdExtensions.LorName)
member.summary: A LorName equivalent of .

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeEgoSkin(BattleUnitView,LorIdExtensions.LorName,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A LorName equivalent of .

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeCreatureSkin(BattleUnitView,LorIdExtensions.LorName)
member.summary: A LorName equivalent of .

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeSkinByModSkinInfo(BattleUnitView,ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ModSkinInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Mostly a ModSkinInfo equivalent of . The additional parameter is used to force the change to the given skin if state is , instead of resetting to the unit's own default skin (useful for copying skins between different units).

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.GetCurrentModSkinInfo(BattleUnitView)
member.summary: A ModSkinInfo equivalent of .

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeSkinWorkshop(BattleUnitView,System.String)
member.summary: An equivalent of

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeEgoSkinWorkshop(BattleUnitView,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: An equivalent of for standalone external skins.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ChangeCreatureSkinWorkshop(BattleUnitView,System.String)
member.summary: An equivalent of for standalone external skins.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.SetAltSkin(BattleUnitView,LorIdExtensions.LorName)
member.summary: A LorName equivalent of .

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.SetAltSkinWorkshop(BattleUnitView,System.String)
member.summary: An equivalent of for standalone external skins.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ResetAltSkin(BattleUnitView)
member.summary: Discards the currently set AltSkin (note that this WILL NOT cause a skin change by itself).

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.ResetAnySkin(BattleUnitView)
member.summary: Fully resets the current view skin, also discarding AltSkin.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.GetOriginalSkin(BattleUnitModel)
member.summary: Tries to get a conclusive identifier of a unit's "original" skin (that is, the skin that the unit would start combat with). This identifier can then be used to make other units "copy" the skin using ChangeSkin.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinExtensions.PreloadSkinSprites(Workshop.WorkshopSkinData)
member.summary: Tries to preload all the sprites in an external skin.

member.name: T:ExtendedLoader.SkinTools
member.summary: The class providing tools for handling skins (that are not extension methods).

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinTools.GetWorkshopBookSkinData(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to find external skin data by mod id and skin name, specifying gender if possible. Also tries to check standalone external skins with the given name if the given mod id does not contain the given skin name.
member.param: Gender specifier (will be added to the skin name if possible).
member.returns: The found skin data, or if nothing was found.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinTools.GetWorkshopBookSkinData(LorIdExtensions.LorName,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to find external skin data by mod id and skin name, specifying gender if possible. Also tries to check standalone external skins with the given name if the given mod id does not contain the given skin name.
member.param: The full skin name, including mod id and internal name.
Gender specifier (will be added to the skin name if possible).
member.returns: The found skin data, or if nothing was found.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinTools.PreloadSkinSprites(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to preload all the sprites in a given external skin from a given mod.

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinTools.PreloadSkinSprites(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to preload all the sprites in a given standalone external skin (that is, a skin that is just ModInfo and not part of a StageModInfo mod).

member.name: M:ExtendedLoader.SkinTools.PreloadSkinSprites(Workshop.WorkshopSkinData)
member.summary: Tries to preload all the sprites in an external skin given its data.
